document.full_text: the estrogen-blocker aromasin was found to reduce the risk of developing breast cancer by 65 percent in post-menopausal women at high risk for breast cancer, researchers said on saturday.
document.title: aromasin cuts risk of breast cancer in some groups
lines_and_colors: the estrogen-blocker aromasin was found to reduce the risk of developing breast cancer by 65 percent in post-menopausal women at high risk for breast cancer, researchers said on saturday.
